job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltpgtforbes believes in the power of entrepreneurial capitalism and uses it on various platforms to ignite the conversations that drive systemic change in business culture and society we celebrate success and are committed to using our megaphone to drive diversity equity and inclusion we are the worlds biggest business media brand and we consistently place in the top of the mostpopular sites in the united states in good company with brands like netflix apple and google in short we have a big platform and we use it responsiblyltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtas a data scientist at forbes on the business intelligence team youll have the opportunity to work on a variety of unique and interesting challenges youll be part of a highly effective team who are leveraging data science to advance our business and drive revenue growthltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtresponsibilitiesltpgtltulgtltligtown the development of new and existing machine learning models with a focus on increasing revenue and helping the site understand its users and competitorsltligtltligtresearch and develop solutions to varied and complex business problems that touch all areas of data science regression classification forecasting nlp clustering etcltligtltligtsome current areas of focus include text classification recommendations audience segmentation multitouch attribution and churnltligtltligtperform data mining on large structured and unstructured datasets to uncover insightsltligtltligtcontinuously improve your skills and knowledge through classes and independent researchltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtwhat you bringltpgtltulgtltligt years experience as a data scientist preferably in the publishing industryltligtltligtms in computer science applied mathematics or other quantitativecomputational discipline from a top western universityltligtltligt years experience with python ampamp sqlltligtltligt years relevant work experience with popular machine learning open source libraries pandas numpy sklearn tensorflowkeras etc apis cloud computing google cloud platform preferred databases bigquery preferred web analytics google analytics preferredltligtltligtsolid understanding of traditional machine learning techniques feature engineering and data cleansinganalysisltligtltligtrealworld experience with natural language processing regression classification clustering and time series forecasting familiarity with deep learning approaches a plusltligtltligtdemonstrated problem solving skills and ability to present complex problems clearlyltligtltligtexperience creating data productsltligtltligtexperience presenting findings to internal stakeholders at different levelsltligtltligtknowledge of data visualization tools iematplotlib plotlyltligtltligtproject management experience a plusltligtltulgtltpgtltpgt
